message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you.  I'm asking $20000 for it.  Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for offering the unique product. I understand its value, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $18000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and see your budget constraints. While I value the product highly, I'm willing to come down to $17000 to make this work. This price still reflects the unique value it offers you.
